title: worktree-merge: Update callers
description:
Update all callers of Merge() to use new signature

## Context

**GitHub Issue:** #4

**Key files for this epic:**
- `internal/parallel/runner.go` - Production caller
- `internal/worktree/merge_test.go` - Test callers (6 sites)
- `internal/worktree/conflict_test.go` - Test caller (1 site)

**Changes:**
Update all Merge(wt) calls to Merge(wt, worktree.MergeOptions{})
